creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: flame like mountains in background with swirling clouds; pagoda at base of mountains at L; dense trees lower center with small huts, large rocks; small figure in fishing boat LLC
inscription: 人戒曰吾老我室〇〇〇画読書〇。。。(...)
markings: poem UR red seal: 師在我 {shi zai ga}; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4], 我有采芝齋  {wa yū saishisai}; LRC red seals: [stylized butterfly], 拙居 {sekkyo}; LLC red seal: 冬日到門惟白雲 {shūjitsu tada shirakumo kado ni itaru}
signed: 古道人画并題時甲子春日於。。。碧翁述題 {Kodōjin ga narabini dai toki kinoe-ne shunjitsu oite %%%%%%%%%%% Hekiō jutsudai} (painting and title by Kodōjin, ...)
title: Landscape with Pine Grove and Rocky Mountains
